about.title: About Me
about.intro1: I'm Dave Ishii — a Fintech and AI entrepreneur with a background in pure mathematics, fashion business, and international market development.
about.intro2: As Founder & CEO of Kiara Inc., I build products that bridge technology and human experience, like the Kiara Translator app for multilingual teams.
about.intro3: Previously at Itochu Corp., I led global fashion brand expansions in Europe and Japan.
about.intro4: Today, I focus on Human-Finance Interaction research, digital identity (eKYC), and innovation at the crossroads of finance, AI, and business strategy.
about.intro5: I share insights regularly through publications, patents, and media, helping organizations navigate transformation with clarity and speed.

kiara.title: Founder & CEO
kiara.description: Kiara Translator is a real-time multilingual translation app designed for Slack, enabling seamless communication across language barriers within teams. It supports over 100 languages and integrates directly into Slack, automatically translating messages to enhance productivity and inclusivity.
kiara.feature1: Real-Time Translation: Messages are translated instantly within Slack, facilitating smooth conversations among team members who speak different languages.
kiara.feature2: Broad Language Support: Kiara supports over 100 languages, making it suitable for diverse, global teams.
kiara.feature3: User-Friendly Integration: As a Slack plugin, Kiara offers a straightforward setup with no hidden fees, allowing teams to start using it immediately without complex configurations.
kiara.feature4: Affordable Pricing: Kiara provides various pricing plans to accommodate different team sizes, starting at $30 per month for up to 10 users.
kiara.impact: Proven Effectiveness: Kiara has been utilized in significant projects, such as supporting 2,000 social innovators at MIT's global hackathon by translating Spanish and Portuguese, demonstrating its reliability in high-stakes environments.

liquid.ekyc2: Lower Costs: Businesses save money because they don't have to handle paper documents or manual checking.
liquid.ekyc3: More Secure: It uses smart technology like face scans or AI to accurately confirm identities and reduce fraud.

features.overviewIntro: Discover the comprehensive suite of features designed to streamline your workflow and boost productivity. Our platform combines powerful core capabilities with advanced features and seamless integrations.
features.overviewCoreText: Our core features provide the essential functionality you need to get started. From robust authentication to comprehensive data management and powerful API integrations, we've built a solid foundation for your success.
features.overviewAdvancedText: Take your productivity to the next level with advanced capabilities including custom workflow automation, real-time analytics, and enterprise-grade security features. These tools are designed for teams that need maximum flexibility and control.
features.overviewIntegrationsText: Connect with the tools you already use. Our extensive integration library allows you to seamlessly connect with popular services and build custom integrations using our flexible API.
features.authenticationIntro: Secure authentication system with multiple sign-in methods and granular access control. Protect your data while providing seamless access to authorized users.
features.authenticationMethod1: Single Sign-On (SSO) with SAML 2.0 and OAuth 2.0 support
features.authenticationMethod2: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) with SMS, email, and authenticator apps
features.authenticationMethod4: Role-based access control (RBAC) with custom permission sets
features.authenticationSecurityText: Advanced security features include session management, IP whitelisting, device fingerprinting, and comprehensive audit logs. Monitor authentication attempts and receive alerts for suspicious activity.
features.dataManagementIntro: Powerful data management capabilities to organize, store, and retrieve your information efficiently. Built for scale with enterprise-grade reliability.
features.dataManagementCapability1: Real-time data synchronization across all devices and platforms
features.dataManagementCapability2: Advanced search and filtering with full-text search capabilities
features.dataManagementCapability3: Automated data backup and disaster recovery
features.dataManagementStorageText: Optimized storage architecture ensures fast access to your data while maintaining cost efficiency. Automatic data compression, intelligent caching, and CDN integration provide optimal performance globally.
features.apiIntegrationIntro: Comprehensive REST and GraphQL APIs enable seamless integration with your existing systems. Build custom solutions and automate workflows with our well-documented API.
features.apiIntegrationEndpointsText: Access over 100 REST API endpoints covering all platform functionality. Our API is versioned, rate-limited, and includes comprehensive error handling. Interactive API documentation makes integration straightforward.
features.apiIntegrationWebhooksText: Subscribe to real-time events using webhooks. Get instant notifications when important events occur, enabling you to build reactive integrations and automation workflows.
features.customWorkflowsIntro: Design and automate complex business processes with our visual workflow builder. No coding required for common scenarios, with full scripting support for advanced use cases.
features.customWorkflowsBuilderText: Drag-and-drop interface for creating workflows. Choose from pre-built templates or design custom flows. Support for conditions, loops, error handling, and parallel execution.
features.customWorkflowsTemplatesText: Get started quickly with our library of pre-built workflow templates covering common business processes. Customize templates to match your specific requirements or build from scratch.
features.analyticsIntro: Gain deep insights into your data with powerful analytics tools. Real-time dashboards, custom reports, and predictive analytics help you make data-driven decisions.
features.analyticsMetric2: Custom dashboard creation with drag-and-drop widgets
features.analyticsMetric3: Advanced data visualization including charts, graphs, and heat maps
features.analyticsReportingText: Generate comprehensive reports with scheduled delivery. Export data in multiple formats (CSV, Excel, PDF) for further analysis or compliance requirements.
features.securityIntro: Enterprise-grade security features protect your sensitive data. We're committed to maintaining the highest security standards and regulatory compliance.
features.securityEncryptionText: All data is encrypted at rest using AES-256 and in transit using TLS 1.3. End-to-end encryption available for sensitive workflows. Encryption keys are managed using industry-standard key management systems.
features.securityComplianceText: Our platform maintains SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, and GDPR compliance. Regular third-party security audits and penetration testing ensure ongoing security posture. Compliance reports available for enterprise customers.
features.integrationsIntro: Connect with hundreds of popular services through our pre-built integrations. Build custom integrations using our flexible API and webhook system.
features.integration1Description: Seamlessly connect with cloud storage providers including Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, and AWS S3. Automatic file synchronization and backup capabilities.
features.integration2Description: Integrate with Slack, Microsoft Teams, Discord, and email platforms. Receive notifications and interact with the platform directly from your communication tools.
features.integration3Description: Connect with GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, Jira, and other development tools. Automate workflows and keep your development process synchronized.
features.integration4Description: Export data to Tableau, Power BI, Looker, and other BI tools. Create comprehensive dashboards combining our platform data with other business metrics.

resources.faq1Question: How do I get started with the platform?

resources.faq2Question: What's included in the free tier?
resources.faq2Answer: The free tier includes access to all core features with generous usage limits. You get up to 3 projects, 5 team members, 1GB storage, and 10,000 API calls per month. Perfect for small teams and personal projects.
resources.faq3Question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
resources.faq3Answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll have immediate access to new features. When downgrading, changes take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.
resources.faq4Answer: We take security very seriously. All data is encrypted at rest and in transit, we maintain SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certifications, and undergo regular third-party security audits. Learn more in our Security documentation.
resources.faq5Answer: Yes! All plans include email support with response times based on your plan tier. Enterprise customers get dedicated support channels, priority response times, and access to our solutions architecture team.
resources.faq6Answer: Absolutely! We believe in data portability. You can export all your data at any time in standard formats (JSON, CSV, XML). We also provide migration tools to help you move data if needed.

before-install.title: What should I check before installing Kiara?
before-install.content:
You need to input the correct number of users in your Slack workspace. If the user number is incorrect, "Kiara might not work".

**Important Note**: If the actual number of people in your slack workspace is different from the number of people registered with Kiara, Kiara Translator may not work.

**Additional Information**:
- Previously, only one person was allowed to access the dashboard after sign-up
- As of August 5th, multiple people can now access the dashboard

cancel-subscription.title: How can I cancel the subscription?

cannot-find-kiara.title: I cannot find Kiara after I install. What's wrong?
cannot-find-kiara.content:
If you cannot find Kiara after installation in your Slack workspace, you might have registered the wrong number of users in Kiara. If the actual number of people in your Slack workspace differs from the number registered with Kiara, the Kiara Translator may not work.

**Steps:**
1) Check how many users you have in your Slack workspace
   - See the user count on the #general channel

2) Change the user count at Kiara's dashboard

cannot-invite-kiara.title: I cannot invite Kiara to a channel. What should I do?
cannot-invite-kiara.content:
If you are in below situation, please try this way to invite Kiara:
- Cannot invite Kiara to a channel at all
- You could invite Kiara to #general channel but not for other channels
- An error occurs when inviting Kiara to a channel

**Solution**: Say "@kiara" in the message box to invite Kiara to a channel.

duplicated-translation.title: Sometimes we see duplicated translation
duplicated-translation.content:
私たちは「duplicated message（重複メッセージ）」エラーについて、これまで何度か問い合わせを受けており、正直なところ頭を悩ませてきました。

エンタープライズのお客様が大量の翻訳リクエストを同時に発生させたときに、このエラーが発生することがあります。ピークは長く続かないため、通常は数時間で自然に解消されます。

この問題は、データベース構造に起因する “技術的負債” が一因となっている可能性があります。

私たちは月次の戦略計画の中で、継続的にこの部分の改善とクリーンアップを進めています。

率直に言うと、2024年と比べると2025年はエラー発生が大幅に減っています。

理由はいくつかありますが、その一つとして、同時に大量のリクエストを処理する際、当社システムと Slack API の間にごくわずかなタイムラグが生じ、Slack API が「正しく応答が返ってきていない」と判断して同じリクエストを二重に送ってしまうことでエラーが起きている可能性があります。

同じリクエストを二重に送ってしまうケースの他に、Kiaraからの返信が特定のメッセージだけつかないケースもあるようです。引き続き改善を続けてまいります。

We get “duplicated message” error inquiry several times - and honestly it has been our headache.(Short answer) Our enterprise customers got it when translation traffic volume is very high. It naturally goes away after few hours because the peak does not last long.(Long answer)This might come from our “technical debt” due to the database structure.We have monthly strategic plan to keep cleaning it regularly.Frankly we see much less errors in 2025 compared with 2024.Among several reasons, we are guessing this error happens when dealing with high volume at the same time, due to the slight time lag in between our system and slack api, slack api might have been calling our system twice by thinking our system is failing to return correct data.

invoice-payment.content:
Yes. Basically we ask you pay annually if you want to pay by invoice. We offer you 20% discount for an annual advance payment by invoice. Get 20% off with an annual payment!

If you want to pay by invoice for a specific period such as until the project ends, please contact us with [form](https://www.getkiara.com/contact) or at hello@kiara.team.

issue-quotation.title: Can you issue a quotation?
issue-quotation.content:
Yes. We can issue a quotation.

Please ask us with [form](https://www.getkiara.com/contact) or at hello@kiara.team

kiara-doesnt-work.title: Kiara doesn't work. What should I check?
kiara-doesnt-work.content:
If Kiara does not work after install, check out the answer here.

If Kiara does not work in the following situation, try these procedures:
- You could invite Kiara to a channel but Kiara does not react

**Steps:**
1) Check how many users you have in your Slack workspace
   - See the user count on the #general channel

2) Change the user count at Kiara's dashboard

languages.title: What languages does Kiara support?
languages.content:
Kiara supports 100 languages. If the language you need is not on the list, please contact them via their [contact form](https://www.getkiara.com/contact) or email hello@kiara.team.

The comprehensive list includes major world languages like English, Spanish, Chinese, Arabic, French, as well as regional languages like Afrikaans, Basque, Cebuano, and Asian languages like Hindi, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese, and European languages like German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese.

mentions-channels.title: Are mentions (@someone) and channels (#channel) translated properly?
mentions-channels.content:
**Mentions (@someone)**: Mentions are translated properly.

**Channels (#channel)**: Translated properly in some languages, shows differently in other languages.

message-length.title: Is there a limit on message length?
message-length.content: Yes. Maximum length is 5000 characters for a message.

mobile-use.title: Can I use Kiara on my mobile?
mobile-use.content: Yes. You can use Kiara on your mobile inside of Slack mobile app.

past-messages.title: Are past messages deleted if I cancel my subscription?
past-messages.content: No. If you cancel your subscription, Kiara will stop the translation. The past messages will not be deleted.

pay-by-others.title: I installed Kiara but someone else needs to pay. How do I change the payer?
pay-by-others.content:
## How to change the payer

You can change the payer from the dashboard.

**Steps to change the payer:**

1. Access [Kiara's website](https://www.getkiara.com/) and click the sign-in button at the top
2. Follow the screen to authorize the app and access your info
3. After logging into the dashboard, click "Plan Setting" button

payment-dashboard-access.title: How can we get to the payment dashboard?
payment-dashboard-access.content:
To access the payment dashboard:

1. Go to www.getkiara.com
2. Click the 'arrow sign' (▼) next to the 'sign up' button at the top
3. Enter the dashboard

For detailed guidance on updating your card, please refer to the [update card guide](https://www.getkiara.com/help/article/update-card).

payment-separate-payer.title: How to start Kiara when paying separately
payment-separate-payer.content:
Coming Soon

Detailed instructions for setting up Kiara when the installer and payer are different people will be available soon. For immediate assistance, please contact us at hello@kiara.team

quick-start.title: Quick start guide
quick-start.content:
## Before Install
- Check how many users are in your Slack workspace beforehand
- **Tip**: Ensure the number of people registered with Kiara matches the actual number of people in your Slack workspace

## How to Install Kiara
(Note: The specific installation steps are missing from this content)

## Additional Tips
**Important Note**: If an error appears after entering credit card information, the article recommends:
- Contacting support before attempting again
- Reach out via:
  - Chat
  - [Contact form](https://www.getkiara.com/contact)
  - Email: hello@kiara.team

reinstall-kiara.title: How to re-install Kiara after technical problem
reinstall-kiara.content:
To re-install Kiara after experiencing technical problems:

1. Remove Kiara from your Slack workspace
2. Clear browser cache and cookies
3. Restart your browser
4. Follow the standard installation process again
5. Ensure user count matches your Slack workspace
6. Contact support if issues persist at hello@kiara.team

remove-kiara-app.title: How to remove Kiara app
remove-kiara-app.content:
Removing Kiara is the same process as removing other Slack apps.

**Steps:**
1. Follow the [official Slack instructions](https://slack.com/help/articles/360003125231-Remove-apps-and-custom-integrations-from-your-workspace) for removing apps from your workspace
2. Also email your cancellation request to hello@kiara.team to ensure your subscription is properly terminated

sentence.title: What happens if a sentence contains more than one language?
sentence.content: The most appropriate language will be detected and reflected into the translated result.

shown-language.title: Can I show only one language translation?
shown-language.content:
For example, if you have 3 languages in your channel, but you need only one to be translated.

**Answer**: No. We cannot provide this feature at the moment. Since some customers asked same issue, we will implement when we are ready.

signin-issues.title: I could not sign-in or up. I see nothing after doing it
signin-issues.content:
**Important:** Only one person can be an admin of Kiara Translator.

**Example:**
If alice@kiara.team already signed up and paid, bob@kiara.team cannot sign in as admin.

**Solution:**
Ensure you're using the admin account that was used for initial signup and payment. For access issues, contact hello@kiara.team

signup-properly.title: How to sign up properly?
signup-properly.content:
Due to the nature of Slack plug-in, there are some ways to install Kiara and 1 is not valid way.

Below is valid way so please double check your way when your installed Kiara is not working properly.

Quick Start

https://www.getkiara.com/help/category/quick-start

https://www.getkiara.com/help/article/install-kiara

To install Kiara to your slack workspace, you will need to access our website and click "Try create it free for 14 days" button on the top page. And follow the screen.

https://youtu.be/oMpMK2riRgs

special-price-payment.title: How can you pay when you agreed a special price with Kiara customer support?
special-price-payment.content:
**For customers with customized pricing:**

1. Choose the plan: 1 person = $3/month (tentatively)
2. We will refund you $3 immediately
3. We will send you the agreed price payment URL separately

**Note:** This temporary selection allows us to set up your custom pricing correctly. Contact hello@kiara.team if you have questions.

status-consumption.title: What is 'Status' and 'Consumption'?
status-consumption.content:
## What is "Status"?

If you click "Status" button after you call Kiara by saying "@kiara" in the message box, the languages you set and the consumption will be shown.

## What is "Consumption"?

It shows the number of characters and the percentage you have used.

**Note**: As of Jan 2021, they are providing translation as "unlimited". So you do not have to worry about it!

translation-consumption-monitoring.title: Can we monitor translation consumption in real-time?
translation-consumption-monitoring.content:
Sorry. Due to the high traffic, we can not provide this dashboard as of Sep 2025.

Since some big customers consume 100M characters/month, technically we can not run SQL smoothly.

🔍 リアルタイムで翻訳利用量を確認することはできますか No.0902申し訳ございませんが、トラフィックが非常に多いため、2025年9月現在このダッシュボードをご提供することができません。一部の大口顧客様が月間1億文字を消費されているため、技術的にSQLをスムーズに実行することができない状況です。

translation-function.title: How do I turn translation on or off?
translation-function.content:
## Turn on the translation function

Say "@kiara" in the message box, click "Setting" and turn on "Translation".

## Turn off the translation function

Say "@kiara" in the message box, click "Setting" and turn off "Translation".

translation-in-reply.title: What is 'Translation in reply' mode?
translation-in-reply.content:
When the timeline feels too noisy, users can activate "Translation in reply" mode to reduce timeline noise.

**To use the mode:**
1. Say "@kiara" in the message box to call Kiara
2. Click "Setting"
3. Set "Translation in reply"

translation-memory.title: Do you have 'translation memory' or 'glossary'?
translation-memory.content: No. If you need to download the result of translation or want to have such dashboard, we will consider to build it. Please tell us if necessary.

update-card.title: How do I update my credit card details?
update-card.content:
You can update your credit card details from the dashboard by following these steps:

1. Access the website and click the "sign in" button at the top
2. Authorize the app and access your info
3. After logging into the dashboard, click the "Plan Setting" button
4. Click the "Update Plan Setting" button
5. Fill in the Payment form and email address
6. Click "Update Plan and Payment"

workflow-translation.title: Can Kiara translate Slack Workflow?
workflow-translation.content:
Sorry. Currently we do not handle Workflow or bot translation.

**Why:**
This might cause an 'infinite loop' of translation when bot translates bot, leading to technical issues.

**Future Plans:**
When we come up with a nice solution, we will develop it and add it to our roadmap.

wrong-translation.title: The translation is wrong. What should I do?
wrong-translation.content:
Currently our customers say Kiara translation accuracy is 90%. We find that it is necessary to provide better translation in special terms, nuances etc. Since the translation is a core part of our service, we will keep improving it.

The company encourages users to report significant mistranslation issues through their:
- Contact Form
- Email: hello@kiara.team
